articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ryu Mi Yong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ryu Mi Yong
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of Ryu Mi Yong, member of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, deputy to the SPA and chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: Ryu Mi Yong Dies
articles.content:
Ryu Mi Yong Dies
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Ryu Mi Yong, member of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, deputy to the SPA and chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, died of lung cancer to our sorrow at 12:10 Wednesday at the age of 95.
					 She was a patriotic political figure who devoted herself to the prosperity of the nation and independent reunification of the country, true to the noble patriotic idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Born as the only daughter of Ryu Tong Yol, a patriot, in an alien land on Feb. 14, Juche 10 (1921) in the dark period of the Japanese imperialist colonial rule, she suffered the bitter sorrow of being a member of the stateless nation. Covering the road of checkered career in pursuit of genuine patriotism, she wandered in south Korea and overseas. Thanks to the profound trust and love of the great leaders she could make a dramatic U turn in her life and enjoyed a worthwhile life after permanently settling in the DPRK together with her husband Choe Tok Sin.
					
					 She worked as adviser to the Central Guidance Committee of the Chondoist Association of Korea, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, chairwoman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, deputy to the SPA of the DPRK and member of the Presidium of the SPA. She fully supported the line of the building of a powerful socialist country of the Workers' Party of Korea and its line of achieving national reunification and made positive efforts for implementing them.
					
					 She revered Marshal Kim Jong Un as God of the nation and the sun of salvation of the world and the people and worked heart and soul to bring earlier a new day of unity of all Koreans and country's reunification till the last moments of her life.
					
					 She was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung, Order of Kim Jong Il, National Reunification Prize and many other state citations for her feats performed for the great unity of the nation and the accomplishment of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 An obituary of Ryu Mi Yong was issued in the joint name of the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK, the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea and the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party.
					
					 The obituary said though she passed away, the exploits she performed for the country and the nation will last forever.
					
					 On the same day, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea and the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party formed a funeral committee with Yang Hyong Sop as chairman and with 10 persons including Kim Yong Chol as members.
					
					 The funeral committee said the bier of the late Ryu Mi Yong is laid in the Sojang Club of Pothonggang District, Pyongyang and it would receive mourners from 10:00 to 19:00 on Thursday and that the bier would be carried from the club at 8:00 on Friday.

articles.title: Many Mourners Visit Bier of Ryu Mi Yong
articles.content:
Many Mourners Visit Bier of Ryu Mi Yong
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Party and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, and people of different social standings Thursday visited the bier of Ryu Mi Yong, member of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, deputy to the SPA and chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, to express condolences over her death.
					 There was a wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in front of the bier.
					
					 Seen there were wreaths in the names of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party, the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, the Secretariat of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, etc.
					
					 The mourners paid silent tribute in memory of Ryu Mi Yong who devoted herself to the work for great national unity and independent reunification of the country till the last moments of her life.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Mozambican President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Mozambican President
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Filipe Jacinto Nwussi, president of the Republic of Mozambique, on Thursday as regards the recent fuel tanker explosion in Mozambique that claimed big casualties and huge material losses.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president, the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					 It wished the Mozambican president and government success in their work to eradicate the consequences of the accident at an early date and bring the inhabitants' life to normal.

articles.title: Director General of European Department 2 of FM Meets Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Director General of European Department 2 of FM Meets Swedish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The director general of the European Department 2 of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK met with the Swedish ambassador to the DPRK on Thursday and discussed with him the issue of bilateral relations and the issue of visit by consular officer to Canadian citizen Rim Hyon Su who is serving prison term after being sentenced to life hard labor for committing anti-DPRK acts.
					 As regards the fact that the ambassador raised the issue of visit by consular officer looking after American criminals detained in the DPRK, the director general underlined the principled stand of the DPRK government that all the issues in the relations with the U.S. is dealt with according to the wartime law to cope with the greatest hostile acts of the Obama administration which dared challenge the supreme dignity of the DPRK.

articles.title: SPA Presidium Ratifies "Convention on Rights of Persons with Disabilities"
articles.content:
SPA Presidium Ratifies "Convention on Rights of Persons with Disabilities
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK ratified the "Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities" on Nov. 23.
					 The DPRK signed the convention on July 3, 2013 and has taken a positive part in the activities related to the convention as an observer for the past three years.
					
					 The DPRK government will further promote the rights and conveniences of the persons with disabilities and further strengthen international cooperation on the basis of this convention.

articles.title: Delegation of Supreme People's Assembly Leaves for Cambodia
articles.content:
Delegation of Supreme People's Assembly Leaves for Cambodia
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK headed by its Deputy Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here on Thursday to take part in the 9th Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly to be held in Cambodia.

articles.title: Vietnamese Youth Union Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Vietnamese Youth Union Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam led by Nguyen Manh Dung, standing secretary of its Central Committee, left here for home Thursday.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un Tuesday received a letter from the members of a delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan which took part in the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK). 
					 The letter said the Sixth Congress of the DWUK was a significant one as it demonstrated before the whole world the firm faith and will of the members of the women's union in the motherland and overseas Korean women to protect and glorify the undying ideology and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and steadily carry forward the tradition of defending the leader unto death etched in the history of Korean women's movement by the great mothers of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the history of patriotism and loyalty under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 During the Sixth Congress of the DWUK, we deeply cherished the immortal ideology enunciated by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and undying exploits performed by them in the history of the women's movement of Juche and felt highly proud and honored to live and struggle as overseas women's activists of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the letter noted, and went on:
					
					 We deeply grasped the truth that wishes and dreams of all the women and children of the country will come true when they faithfully uphold you.
					
					 We will always bear in mind the glory, happiness and valuable mental pabulum we received while staying in the motherland and uphold your ideology and leadership with single-minded loyalty and steadily carry forward the proud history and tradition of the movement of Korean women in Japan, a part of the Korean socialist women's movement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Members of Delegation of Women Officials of General Federation of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Members of Delegation of Women Officials of General Federation of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday received a letter from the members of a delegation of women officials of the General Association of Koreans in China who took part in the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					 During the congress we deeply grasped the immortal feats the peerlessly great persons performed in taking warm care of the women and training them as a powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot and heroes of the era, the letter said, adding:
					
					 We renewed our patriotic will, looking back upon the noble spiritual world of the Korean women who have become the roots and cornerstone in upholding the party, the leader and the country despite difficulties and trials.
					
					 During the days of the congress, we keenly realized that the compatriots have been blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation, looking up to you, and made a firm pledge of faith to follow and uphold you only despite any storm and stress in the alien land.
					
					 We will firmly build the General Association of Koreans in China as you Kim Jong Un's overseas citizens organization which upholds your ideology and leadership single-mindedly under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in hearty response to the important letter sent by you.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
 Mundok, November 24 (KCNA) -- Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Iran Friendship Ripsok Co-op Farm in Mundok County, South Phyongan Province, Thursday on the occasion of the DPRK-Iran friendship week.
					 At the observation platform, they were briefed on the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in developing the farm. Then they visited the Ripsok room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 They helped farmers.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Biology Field Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Biology Field Held
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of biology took place at the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences on Wednesday and Thursday. It was sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were officials, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of more than ten units including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, University of Sciences, the State Academy of Sciences, the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Academy of Medical Science and the Central Botanical Garden.
					
					 The presentation was aimed at rapidly developing bioengineering by boosting academic exchange in basic theories and applied sciences in biology and energetically promoting scientific researches to widely introduce the achievements made in the study of modern biology into agriculture, medical science and food industry.
					
					 More than 250 papers were presented to the presentation, divided into the panels of bioengineering, biology, botany, zoology and microbiology. 
					
					 The participants presented achievements made in the researches to bring cell engineering, gene engineering and microorganism engineering to the world level and solve scientific and technical problems arising in different fields such as agricultural production, fruit farming, medical science, food industry, energy and environment protection.

articles.title: Anniversary of State Price-setting Institution Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of State Price-setting Institution Marked
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The State Price-setting Institution marks the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 President Kim Il Sung published the famous work "On Forming State Price-setting Department and Enforcing State Control on Price" on Nov. 25, Juche 35 (1946) and took a measure to form the state price-setting body for the first time in the DPRK.
					
					 The President set forth an original idea on the unified price and established the unified price-setting system and thus provided firm cornerstone for the work.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il comprehensively systematized and developed in depth the idea and theory of the Juche-oriented and popular price set forth by the President and wisely led the price-related work to bring about a new turn.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in developing the price-related work as required by the developing reality and concretely indicated the ways for correctly solving the price-setting issues arising in the overall economic operation and the people's life.
					
					 Over the past seven decades, the institution has served as a powerful means for firmly ensuring the planned development of the national economy and the systematic improvement of the people's living standard and improving and strengthening the overall economic management and created a shining example in the socialist price-setting work.
					
					 A meeting for marking its founding anniversary was held on Thursday.

articles.title: Kimchi-making Contest Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Kimchi-making Contest Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A kimchi-making contest was held here some days ago.
					 Taking part in the contest, divided into two sections--whole cabbage kimchi sampling and show of various kinds of kimchi (pickled vegetables)--, were more than 30 units under the General Bureau of Public Service.
					
					 Whole cabbage kimchi is made with mixture of sliced radish and powdered red pepper, garlic, ginger and other seasonings and salted shrimp, pollack and pear.
					
					 The kinds of kimchi include wrapped-up kimchi, pickled sliced radishes and cabbages seasoned with pepper and leaf-mustard kimchi.
					
					 Okryu and Chongryu restaurants, Pyongyang Noodle House, Munsu Restaurant and several other units won a high appreciation at the contest.
					
					 The contest marked a significant occasion in further developing the traditional kimchi-making method at homes.

articles.title: Restaurants' Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
Restaurants' Cooking Competition Held
 Hamhung, November 24 (KCNA) -- Restaurants' cooking competition in local areas were held at Sinhung Restaurant on Nov. 23 and 24.
					 The competition was sponsored by the Central Committee of the Korean Association of Cooks. Sinhung Jangsu, Amnokgang, Okgye, Kyongam, Songdowon, Amnok and Waudo restaurants and Kanggye Noodle House took part in the competition. 
					
					 The competition was held by way of experience presentation and the examination of cooking made by cooks selected from every unit on spots. Presented to the competition were dishes by using grain, meat, fish and vegetables.
					
					 Sinhung Restaurant took the first place at the competition.

articles.title: American-Style Democracy Meets Its End in Face of Int'l Community: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
American-Style Democracy Meets Its End in Face of Int'l Community: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the British newspaper the Financial Times reported that the recent U.S. presidential election was recorded in history as the dirtiest one and it gave the international community an opportunity of getting disillusioned with American-style democracy and sneering at the U.S.
					 U.S. media also said that the recent presidential election gave a chance of disclosing the absurdity and reactionary nature of American-style democracy.
					
					 Most of world analysts unanimously commented that there has never been before such presidential election which directly defamed the moral value of the U.S. and its image as "a guardian of democracy."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary that the above-said comment is nothing new.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has interfered in other countries' internal affairs in every matter while styling itself a guardian of democracy and a judge but the recent presidential election provided American-style democracy with an opportunity of facing a stern judgment by the world.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer work hard to cover up its ambition for dominating other countries and nations with a silk veil.
					
					 American-style democracy is no longer workable as a major lever for achieving its sinister purpose and realizing its ambition for dominating legitimate sovereign states.
					
					 The U.S. has neither face nor justification to force its democracy upon other countries.
					
					 American-style democracy is not genuine one but the most reactionary and corrupt one. For any country and nation to accept it leads to its ruin. This is the conclusion made by the international community this time.
					
					 The endless criticism and mockery made of the recent presidential election meant the end of American-style democracy.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules S. Korean Foreign Ministry's Farces to Improve External Image of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Foreign Ministry's Farces to Improve External Image of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Gentries of the south Korean puppet Foreign Ministry are making desperate efforts to improve "the external image of traitor Park Geun Hye by arranging "summit talks" and meetings with ambassadors, although she is no more than "vegetable president" unable to chair even a "state council meeting," threatened with impeachment.
					 In the meantime, they are trying hard to calm down the angry public, raising a hue and cry over "serious foreign exchange problem" and "diplomatic vacuum" caused by the results of the U.S. presidential election.
					
					 This is nothing but "diplomacy to help Park Geun Hye survive," a clear indication of the wretched plight of the despicable group of accomplices making last-ditch efforts to tide over the worst crisis.
					
					 Great irony is that mandarins of the puppet Foreign Ministry are foolish enough to shied and patronize Park though they have become a laughing stock of the international community due to the shaman's diplomacy.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the south Korean Foreign Ministry is nothing but a servant and puppet of the green shaman as its mandarins have been busy with diplomacy in the international arena at the instructions of "the night president" Choe Sun Sil, not of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 They begged for "cooperation" in ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the DPRK worldwide after Choe Sun Sil made superstitious prophecy "collapse of the north". They turned all sorts of diplomatic schedules including itineraries of foreign tours and summit talks and signing of various agreements into the shaman's silly rites.
					
					 Now some countries and high dignitaries are experiencing hot agony of shame after dealing with Park Geun Hye who talked about "aid" and "cooperation" according to the foolish diplomacy of the shaman.
					
					 Nothing is more foolhardy than the attitude of Park trying hard to resume her diplomacy at a time when even neighboring countries are turning their backs on her, stunned by the fact that they have dealt so far with Choe Sun Sil, not with the south Korean "president".
					
					 That was why Park was not in a position to take part in the APEC summit for the first time in history as nobody was willing to deal with "the president with 5 percent support rate" and "criminal president". This is the present picture of south Korean diplomacy driven into a tight corner. 
					
					 Precisely for this reason experts in the fields of unification, diplomacy and security of south Korea issued a declaration on the situation demanding the ministry give up at once "shameful diplomacy." They claimed that if the "president," who brought about chaos of unification, diplomacy and security, persistently works to control diplomacy, she will not be able to escape catastrophe. 
					
					 Yun Pyong Se and other confidants of Park Geun Hye are now making desperate efforts to quell the demand of the people for her resignation talking about "nuclear threat from the north" swimming against the trend of the times, but this will only touch off stronger popular resistance. 
					
					 It is not long before Yun Pyong Se and others of the ministry, traitors and accomplices in the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" will go to the political scaffold together with the worst wicked woman Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: S. Korean People, Overseas Koreans Stage Strong Actions for Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean People, Overseas Koreans Stage Strong Actions for Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- According to Yonhap News and other media of south Korea, the Minju Party of south Korea formed the "Taejon City Party and Sejong City Party Headquarters of the People's Sovereignty Movement for Resignation of President Park Geun Hye" in Taejon City on Nov. 21 with the representative, the executive chairman and the leadership of the party and its core members attending.
					 At an inaugural ceremony the representative of the party asserted that as long as Park declared a hold-out that she would not step down of her own accord, the people should oust her.
					
					 He said that if the "Saenuri Party" patronizes Park, the people should judge the ruling party, to begin with.
					
					 The former "prime minister" said that the "president" should be taken to prison the moment when she is taken out of Chongwadae.
					
					 The Council of Christian Churches issued a statement on Nov. 22 abusing Park of refusing the prosecution's investigation.
					
					 The North Jolla Provincial Christian Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime was formed in North Jolla Province on Nov. 21.
					
					 12 organizations of disabled persons held a rally in Youido, Seoul on the same day demanding Park's resignation.
					
					 That day the Situation Council of University Students held a ceremony of proclaiming university students all-out action at Kwanghwamun Square in Seoul.
					
					 151 Korean professors at 84 universities in the U.S. issued a declaration on the situation.
					
					 The declaration said media of south Korea should fulfill their mission and responsibility.

articles.title: S. Korean People Call for Not Allowing Park Geun Hye to Stay in Power
articles.content:
S. Korean People Call for Not Allowing Park Geun Hye to Stay in Power
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore in an editorial on Nov. 22 said that Park Geun Hye is rejecting the prosecution's investigation and even the results of investigation while doggedly defying the people's demand for her resignation.
					 Park, suspect in crimes, tries hard not to step down from "presidential office" but we cannot allow her to stay in power, the editorial noted.

articles.title: Seoul Mayor Accuses S. Korean Puppet Group of Defying Public Mindset
articles.content:
Seoul Mayor Accuses S. Korean Puppet Group of Defying Public Mindset
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Seoul mayor denounced the puppet group for defying the public mindset at the "state council meeting" on Nov. 22, according to the south Korean CBS.
					  At the meeting the chief for legislation and the minister of Justice, etc. chided opposition parties, grumbling that the right to nominate a team for special investigation is not fair after the bill related to the special investigation into Choe Sun Sil was put on the agenda.
					
					 Angered by this, the Seoul mayor denounced the chief for legislation for failing to properly understand the public mindset.
					
					 When the puppet minister of Defense underscored the need to handle military affairs after the draft agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan was brought up for discussion and the foreign minister supported the former's assertion and called for its quick clearing, the mayor declared it was very wrong to hastily handle the crucial issue at this grave time and this would leave a shameful blot in history.
					
					 The mayor walked out of the meeting place in token of protest.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Denounced by CBS for Ignoring People's Demand
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Denounced by CBS for Ignoring People's Demand
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS Wednesday denounced Park Geun Hye for ignoring the people's demand and seeking to prolong her remaining days.
					 It held that the present "president", "prime minister" and "members of the State Council" do not feel ashamed even a bit.
					
					 It deplored that when presenting writs of appointment to some staff members and under secretaries of Chongwadae and new ambassadors on Nov. 18, she smiled before reporters, an indication of her will not to yield to the one million-candlelight vigils.

articles.title: Epidemics Occur in S. Korea
articles.content:
Epidemics Occur in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred again at a duck farm in Kimje City, North Jolla Province of south Korea, according to KBS of south Korea on Nov. 22.
					 More than 100 ducks were culled.
					
					 Meanwhile, cow tuberculosis occurred at a farm in Poun County, North Chungchong Province.

articles.title: S. Korean Students in U.S. Demand Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean Students in U.S. Demand Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- 307 south Korean students of Michigan University of the U.S. held a candlelight rally at the university on Nov. 19 and issued a declaration on the situation demanding Park Geun Hye's resignation, according to the south Korean paper Segye Ilbo.
					 Speakers said they supported the candlelight actions of people from all walks of life in south Korea demanding the present regime's resignation while condemning the Park regime's monopolization of politics which put the south Korean society into chaos.
					
					 Prior to it, south Korean students of more than 40 universities of the U.S. took part in the campaign for issuing a declaration on the situation demanding the Park regime's resignation.

articles.title: Japanese University Professor Demands Abe's Official Apology for Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese University Professor Demands Abe's Official Apology for Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) --- Haruki Wada, honorary professor at Tokyo University, demanded the Japanese prime minister make an official apology for the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army on Nov. 21, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 In an article contributed by him to the Japanese magazine Sekai he said Abe did not make an apology for sexual slavery through official document. It is needless to say that such arrogant attitude hurt the sentiment of the south Korean people once again, he noted.
					
					 He stressed the Japanese government should make an apology and reparation for the victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army not only in south Korea but also in different countries of the world.

articles.title: Students' Strike in S. Korea Demands Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
Students' Strike in S. Korea Demands Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The General Students Council of Seoul National University resolved to stage a students' strike for the Park Geun Hye regime's resignation on Nov. 22, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It is necessary to increase the scope of the actions for Park's resignation in society, the organization said, noting it would launch a students' strike on Nov. 30.
					
					 It called upon professors of the university to take part in the strike to join the students.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye and Her Group Indicted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye and Her Group Indicted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea are indicting Park Geun Hye and her group and demanding a stern punishment of them, according to CBS and MBC of south Korea.
					 Ri Jae Myong, mayor of Songnam City of Kyonggi Provinice, on Nov. 22 submitted an indictment to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office demanding Park be punished on charges of dereliction of duty and accidental homicide as regards seven hours of her act at the time of the ferry Sewol sinking.
					
					 On Nov. 21 the Press Trade Union submitted an indictment to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office demanding a punishment of Park and Kim Ki Chun, former chief secretary of Chongwadae.
					
					 It accused Park and Kim of obstructing press activities by way of unreasonably dismissing the manager of the paper Segye Ilbo who reported about the suspected intervention in "state affairs" by Jong Yun Hoe.
					
					 The Damage Measure Committee of the Kaesong Industrial Zone referred Choe Sun Sil to the prosecution.
					
					 It said that a thorough investigation should be made of Choe on the suspicion that she deeply interfered in the decision on closing the zone and suspending south-north economic cooperation.

articles.title: Effectuation of Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence with Japan Opposed by S. Korean Opposition Parties
articles.content:
Effectuation of Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence with Japan Opposed by S. Korean Opposition Parties
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- An agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan pushed forward by the Park Geun Hye's group of traitors took effect on Wednesday, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 Three opposition parties, upset by this, unanimously branded the present "government" as the one of traitors, adding it is a traitorous act that the agreement was passed through a "meeting of the State Council".

articles.title: Organization of Koreans in China Calls for Nationwide Meeting for Reunification
articles.content:
Organization of Koreans in China Calls for Nationwide Meeting for Reunification
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on Tuesday called on all Koreans to turn out in the drive for nationwide meeting for reunification and pave a wide avenue to peace and reunification of Korea.
					 All the members of the association will turn out as one in the drive to respect the three principles of national reunification and north-south joint declarations, restore all the valuable results of the June 15 joint declaration as early as possible and dynamically usher in the second June 15 era for independent reunification, the statement said, adding that the  association would smash the heinous military moves of the U.S. pushing forward the THAAD deployment in the south of the Korean peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war despite the strong opposition of all Koreans and more powerfully wage the struggle for withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea. 
					
					 Through the nationwide meeting for reunification involving all the political parties, organizations and individuals in the north, south and overseas, we will turn out as one in the drive to defuse the great danger of war and usher in a new era of national reunification and peace and prosperity, reflecting the general will of the nation, it noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that to hold him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution and deals with the tasks arising in continuing to strengthen and develop the WPK into a glorious Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Kuwait on Nov. 17.
					 Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwaiti preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 It decided to inform people of his revolutionary career and feats through media and significantly organize a seminar, remembrance meeting, film show and other political and cultural events between Nov. 17 and Dec. 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the Socialist Party of Romania on Nov. 19.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary life and exploits from Nov. 20 to Dec. 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Nov. 17.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary life and exploits on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mexico
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A Mexican committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Nov. 17.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary life and exploits and significantly organize political and cultural events on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias por el deceso de Ryu Mi Yong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias por el deceso de Ryu Mi Yong
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 24 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Ryu Mi Yong, miembro del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, diputada a la APS y presidenta del Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, en senal de profundas condolencias por su deceso.

articles.title: Fallece Ryu Mi Yong
articles.content:
Fallece Ryu Mi Yong
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Ryu Mi Yong, miembro del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, diputada a la APS y presidenta del Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, fallecio lamentablemente a las 12:10 del dia 23 a la edad de 95 anos por el cancer de pulmon. 
					Ryu es activista politica que trabajo con abnegacion por la prosperidad de la nacion y la reunificacion independiente de la patria en acato al noble ideal patriotico del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Nacida en la tierra extranjera el 14 de febrero del 10 (1921) de la Era Juche, periodo de coloniaje japones sobre Corea, como unica hija del patriota Ryu Tong Yol, ella ha experimentado en carne propia las tristezas del pueblo subyugado y se ha esforzado mucho por buscar el verdadero camino de patriotismo. Estuvo en el suelo surcoreano y los paises extranjeros y logro el dramatico cambio de su vida gracias a la confianza y benevolencias de los grandes Lideres. Se ha asentado en la RPDC con su esposo Choe Tok Sin comenzando una vida digna. 
					
					Trabajando como asesora del Comite de Direccion Central de la Asociacion de Chondoistas de Corea, presidenta del Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U y del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun, diputada a la APS y miembro del Presidium de la APS, realizo ingentes esfuerzos por apoyar activamente y poner en practica las lineas del PTC en materia de la construccion de potencia socialista y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Hasta el ultimo momento de su vida, dedico todo lo suyo por la unidad de todos los connacionales y la reunificacion respetando al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Redentor de la nacion.
					
					Por sus meritos realizados por la gran unidad nacional y el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria, Ryu recibio las Ordenes Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el Premio Reunificacion de la Patria y muchas condecoraciones estatales.
					
					Se ha publicado la vispera la esquela mortuoria en nombre comun del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria y el CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U.
					
					La nota senala que aunque Ryu fallecio, seran transmitidos para siempre sus meritos acumulados ante la patria y la nacion.
					
					El mismo dia, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el CC del FDRP y el CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U compusieron el comite funeral con Yang Hyong Sop como presidente y Kim Yong Chol y otros 9 como miembros.
					
					El comite funeral anuncio que el feretro de la difunta reposa en la Casa de Sojang del capitalino municipio de Pothonggang, recibira a los asistentes al funeral desde las 10:00 hasta las 19:00 del dia 24 y el feretro saldra para el entierro a las 8:00 del dia 25.

articles.title: AEDHC envia interpelacion abierta a la ONU
articles.content:
AEDHC envia interpelacion abierta a la ONU
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que el 3o comite del 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU aprobo el dia 15 de modo coercitivo el "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH del Norte (de Corea)", la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea (AEDHC) hizo publica el dia 23 el acta de interpelacion abierta enviada a la ONU.
					Estados Unidos, algunos paises satelites de la Union Europea, los reaccionarios japoneses y otra chusma volvieron a fabricar el "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH del Norte", adelanta el documento y prosigue:
					
					Este hecho es una intolerable violacion a la soberania de la RPDC y un acto terrorista de Estado destinado a derrocar el regimen de ella. 
					
					Para colmo, abusando de la ONU, EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras ofendieron hasta la dignidad de nuestra Direccion Suprema, considerada por todos nuestros militares y habitantes como su vida, destino y futuro, lo cual constituye una provocacion de peor calana que merece el castigo rotundo y despiadado. 
					
					Indignada por el proceder injusto de la ONU que en contra de su imagen de prestigiosa organizacion internacional, adopto esa "resolucion" egocentrista sin visitar ni una vez al pais interesado dejandose llevar por las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC e interviniendo en asuntos internos del digno Estado soberano, la AEDHC le formula publicamente las siguientes preguntas:
					
					1. ?Conoce la ONU la realidad maravillosa de la RPDC donde las masas trabajadoras comunes ejercen como duenas de la sociedad el verdadero derecho politico, indice fundamental de DDHH?
					
					2. ?Sabe la ONU la situacion real de la RPDC en que se da prioridad a los intereses del pueblo y se concentran todas las fuerzas en el mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo aun en medio de la persistente sancion y presion de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles?
					
					3. ?Esta enterada la ONU de que la RPDC garantiza y asegura sustancialmente los verdaderos derechos del hombre, inclusive los derechos a estudiar, recibir la asistencia medica y trabajar?
					
					4. ?Es consciente la ONU de que el acto de insultar atrevidamente a la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC constituye imperdonable provocacion a todos los militares y civiles coreanos y va a causar la represalia y castigo implacables?
					
					Al finalizar, la AEDHC subraya que la ONU no debe eludir la respuesta a la presente interpelacion abierta.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun vaticina la quiebra de democracia al estilo estadounidense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun vaticina la quiebra de democracia al estilo estadounidense
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el periodico britanico Financial Times transmitio que las recientes elecciones presidenciales de Estados Unidos fueron calificadas de las mas indecentes de la historia y dieron a la sociedad internacional la oportunidad de abrigar la decepcion de la democracia al estilo norteamericano y burlarse de EE.UU.
					 Los medios de prensa estadounidenses tambien criticaron que dichos comicios sirvieron de un motivo para revelar lo absurdo y reaccionario de la democracia al estilo norteamericano.
					
					  La mayoria de analistas del mundo coincide en que vieron por primera vez tales elecciones que deterioraron directamente el valor moral de EE.UU. y su imagen de "defensor de democracia".
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y prosigue:
					
					  EE.UU. vino interviniendo caso por caso en los asuntos internos de otros paises como si fuera juez creyendose el defensor de la democracia.
					
					Pero, a traves de las presentes elecciones presidenciales, la democracia al estilo norteamericano fue condenada severamente a la vista del mundo.
					
					  EE.UU. debe dejar de disimular con el cartel de democracia su ambicion de dominar a otros paises y naciones.
					
					  Este pais no tiene cara ni justificacion para imponer la democracia por su estilo que sirve de herramienta para alcanzar sus siniestros objetivos y dominar a los legitimos Estados soberanos.
					
					  Esa democracia es la mas reaccionaria y corrupta y aceptarla significa llevar al arruinamiento el destino del pais y la nacion. Esto es la conclusion sacada esta vez por la sociedad internacional.
					
					  La avalancha de criticas y burlas a las elecciones presidenciales de EE.UU. de este ano son la senal de quiebra de la democracia de ese tipo.
